skills.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
skills.blurb: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rek'Sai''' generates {{tip|fury|{{as|25 Fury}}}} upon dealing damage with [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Prey Seeker|Rek'Sai}}, {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai}} or {{ai|Furious Bite|Rek'Sai}}, and loses {{as|20 Fury}} per second if she hasn't generated any in the last 5 seconds.

While {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|burrowed}}}}, '''Rek'Sai''' consumes her current {{as|Fury}} over 3 seconds, {{tip|healing}} for up to {{pp|20 to 190}} at {{as|100 Fury}}, stopping once she consumes it all or returns to {{sti|health|{{as|full health}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Rek'Sai generates fury|as upon dealing damage with basic attacks, Rek'Sai, Rek'Sai or Rek'Sai, and loses as per second if she hasn't generated any in the last 5 seconds.
While sbc, Rek'Sai consumes her current as over 3 seconds, healing for up to 20 to 190 â€’ undefined at as, stopping once she consumes it all or returns to health.
skills.notes: * {{tip|Fury}} bar changes from {{color|yellow|'''Yellow'''}} to {{color|red|'''Red'''}} when full.

skills.name: Queen's Wrath
skills.blurb: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai's''' next three basic attacks within 5 seconds have a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time and deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to the target and all surrounding enemies. The damage to the primary target is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
''Queen's Wrath'' ends prematurely and goes on cooldown if '''Rek'Sai''' is {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|burrowed}} for more than {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Queen's Wrath'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Rek'Sai's''' basic attack timer.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Rek'Sai's next three basic attacks within 5 seconds have a 0.25-second cast time and deal as to the target and all surrounding enemies. The damage to the primary target is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Queen's Wrath ends prematurely and goes on cooldown if Rek'Sai is ai for more than 1.5 seconds.
Queen's Wrath basic attack reset|resets Rek'Sai's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 40*3}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Damage to the primary target applies {{tip|proc damage}} and damage to secondary targets applies {{tip|default damage}}.
* ''Queen's Wrath's'' bonus damage applies against [[structures]].
* There is a brief delay between each attack of ''Queen's Fury'' after the attack's cast time elapses.
** If '''Rek'Sai''' has more than {{as|{{fd|1.4}} attack speed}}, she can cancel this delay to perform the next attack quicker. This does not occur if she is {{tip|acquisition radius|attacking automatically}}.
* ''Queen's Wrath's'' enhanced attacks still apply [[on-hit]] and [[on-attack]] effects and [[life steal]] to the primary target.
* When {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, the damage dealt to the primary target is nullified; however, damage to any secondary targets still occurs.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Queen's Wrath'' interactions with {{tip|block|blocking}} and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

skills.name: Prey Seeker
skills.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' fires a void-charged pulse in the target direction that detonates on the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: sbc Rek'Sai fires a void-charged pulse in the target direction that detonates on the first enemy hit, dealing as to enemies within the area and sight|revealing them for 2.5 seconds.
skills.notes:
* ''Prey Seeker'' will cast fire from wherever '''Rek'Sai''' is at the end of the cast time.
* ''Prey Seeker's'' effect radius is centered around the location of the missile as it collides.

effects.str:
• st: Physical Damage
  • as as: undefined

skills.name: Burrow
skills.blurb: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' burrows into the ground, reducing her {{tip|sight}} radius to 250 units, but gaining {{pp|15 to 30 for 4|1 to 16|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, becoming {{tip|ghosted}}, accessing an alternate set of basic [[Champion ability|abilities]], and activating ''Tremor Sense''.
{{sbc|Tremor Sense:}} '''Rek'Sai''' and her allies gain {{tip|obscured vision}} of nearby enemy units that are not {{tip|sight|visible}} every {{fd|1.5}} seconds if they are moving.
'''Rek'Sai''' automatically burrows upon [[death|respawning]] once ''Burrow'' has been learned.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, reducing her sight radius to 250 units, but gaining 15 to 30 for 4 â€’ undefined ms, becoming ghosted, accessing an alternate set of basic Champion ability, and activating Tremor Sense.
sbc Rek'Sai and her allies gain obscured vision of nearby enemy units that are not sight|visible every 1.5 seconds if they are moving.
Rek'Sai automatically burrows upon death once Burrow has been learned.
skills.notes:
*''Burrow'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* '''Rek'Sai's''' {{sti|attack range|link=range}} is reduced {{ft|to 75|by 100}} while burrowed.
* While ''Burrowed'', '''Rek'Sai''' is not locked out from declaring basic attacks, attempting to do so will cause her to ''Unburrow'' automatically.
* Enemies detected by ''Tremor Sense'' are displayed as rings on the ground (champions display much larger ones and play a sound effect audible to all units).
* Enemies standing still while '''Rek'Sai''' is nearby are insensible to ''Tremor Sense''.
[[File:Rek'Sai_Ring_Screenshot.jpg|thumb|left|300px|'''Rek'Sai''' sensing a nearby enemy with ''Tremors Sense''.]]

skills.name: Unburrow
skills.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' bursts out of the ground, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to surrounding enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocking them aside}}. The enemy closest to the center is {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second instead, and cannot be affected again by ''Unburrow'' for some time.
'''Rek'Sai''' can also trigger ''Unburrow'' by issuing an attack command, applying the full {{tip|airborne|knock up}} against the target.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Rek'Sai bursts out of the ground, dealing as to surrounding enemies and airborne|knocking them aside. The enemy closest to the center is airborne|knocked up for 1 second instead, and cannot be affected again by Unburrow for some time.
Rek'Sai can also trigger Unburrow by issuing an attack command, applying the full airborne|knock up against the target.
skills.notes:
*''Unburrow'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Unburrow's'' per-target {{sti|cooldown}} only applies to targets affected by the full {{tip|airborne|knock-up}}, but provides immunity to all effects of the ability.
* ''Unburrow'' is still considered an ability and is thus stopped by {{tip|silence}}. She can basic attack normally during this time, without leaving ''unburrow''.
** If '''Rek'Sai''' is {{tip|disarm|disarmed}}, she cannot issue an attack command to trigger ''Unburrow''.

skills.name: Furious Bite
skills.blurb: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' bites the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}.
At maximum {{tip|fury|{{as|Fury}}}}, ''Furious Bite's'' damage is doubled and converted to {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Rek'Sai bites the target enemy, dealing them as.
At maximum fury|as, Furious Bite's damage is doubled and converted to as.

skills.name: Tunnel
skills.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, leaving behind a ''Tunnel'' with two interconnected entrances, lasting up to 10 minutes. The ''Tunnel'' can be traversed again if '''Rek'Sai''' targets either entrance, shutting down the ''Tunnel'' for a few seconds.

'''Rek'Sai''' can have up to 8 pairs of entrances active on the map at the same time, and forming subsequent tunnels beyond the maximum destroys the eldest one. Enemy {{tip|champions}} can destroy a ''Tunnel'' by standing on either entrance for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, granting them {{g|5}} upon successfully destroying the ''Tunnel''.

An ''Unburrowed'' '''Rek'Sai''' will automatically {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai}} before entering the ''Tunnel'' and automatically {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai}} after exiting it. This does not put {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai}} on cooldown nor trigger {{ai|Fury of the Xer'Sai|Rek'Sai}}, but does trigger other ''Burrow'' effects and {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai}}.
'''Rek'Sai''' cannot enter a tunnel while {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}, {{tip|ground|grounded}}, or {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Rek'Sai dashes in the target direction, leaving behind a Tunnel with two interconnected entrances, lasting up to 10 minutes. The Tunnel can be traversed again if Rek'Sai targets either entrance, shutting down the Tunnel for a few seconds.
Rek'Sai can have up to 8 pairs of entrances active on the map at the same time, and forming subsequent tunnels beyond the maximum destroys the eldest one. Enemy champions can destroy a Tunnel by standing on either entrance for 1.5 seconds, granting them g upon successfully destroying the Tunnel.
An Unburrowed Rek'Sai will automatically Rek'Sai before entering the Tunnel and automatically Rek'Sai after exiting it. This does not put Rek'Sai on cooldown nor trigger Rek'Sai, but does trigger other Burrow effects and Rek'Sai.
Rek'Sai cannot enter a tunnel while immobilize|immobilized, ground|grounded, or silence|silenced.
skills.notes:
* ''Tunnel'' entrances can be targeted by allied movement abilities ({{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}, {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}, {{si|Teleport}}).
* ''Tunnel'' entrances are {{tip|sight|visible}} on allied champions' minimaps, while enemies must first gain {{tip|sight}} of one before it becomes visible on theirs (the opposite entrance is not revealed).
* Destroying a ''Tunnel'' while '''Rek'Sai''' is traversing it will not prevent her from reaching the opposite entrance.
* '''Rek'Sai''' can ''Tunnel'' through terrain if she dashes close to them and the wall is thin enough to allow the opposite entrance to spawn on the other side.

skills.name: Void Rush
skills.blurb: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rek'Sai''' applies ''Marked as Prey'' to enemy champions she damages, lasting 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' selects an enemy champion with ''Marked as Prey'', becoming {{tip|displacement immune}} and {{tip|vanish|vanishing}} into the ground. After {{fd|1.5}} seconds, she becomes targetable again and emerges from the ground as {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} near the target and {{tip|dash|pounces}} at them, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} upon arrival and landing 125 units behind them.

''The damage can be dodged if the target moves {{tt|1000|pending for confirmation}} or more units away. If the target dies or is too far away before '''Rek'Sai''' vanishes, Void Rush is canceled with a 10 second {{sti|cooldown}}.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
sbc Rek'Sai applies Marked as Prey to enemy champions she damages, lasting 5 seconds.
sbc Rek'Sai selects an enemy champion with Marked as Prey, becoming displacement immune and vanish|vanishing into the ground. After 1.5 seconds, she becomes targetable again and emerges from the ground as ai near the target and dash|pounces at them, dealing them as upon arrival and landing 125 units behind them.
The damage can be dodged if the target moves tt or more units away. If the target dies or is too far away before Rek'Sai vanishes, Void Rush is canceled with a 10 second cooldown.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 400}} {{as|(+ 175% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
skills.notes:
* '''Rek'Sai''' will track the target if they change locations.
** She will dash through the target's previous location without dealing damage if the target is too far away or moves beyond the maximum tracking distance.
* Damage from items, runes, and summoner spells count for applying the mark.
* ''Void Rush'' has a brief cast time during which '''Rek'Sai''' is still targetable.
* ''Void Rush's'' {{tip|displacement immunity}} begins from the start of the cast time, and ends when the dash ends.
* ''Void Rush's'' damage can be dodged by becoming {{tip|untargetable}}.
* '''Rek'Sai''' can activate ''Void Rush'' while {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} or {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}}.
** She will always emerge as ''Unburrowed''.
* If '''Rek'Sai''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during the cast time, ''Void Rush'' is canceled and goes on a 10 second cooldown.
** If the ''resurrection'' occurs while {{tip|vanish|vanished}}, she will emerge and pounce the target immediately.
* A screeching noise made by '''Rek'Sai''' can be heard globally after ''Void Rush'' is cast (''will be heard by enemies even if they don't have {{tip|sight}} of '''Rek'Sai''' and/or her destination'').
